name: Nutrition
description: Through collaboration with the San Francisco-Marin Food Bank, Mission Housing developments receive weekly shipments of healthy food including staples such as rice and potatoes as well as fresh produce. Along with resident volunteers, staffs facilitate food pantries where residents can shop for free groceries.
